content.question: In lines 4-6 (Quamvis enim...condiderit), Pliny describes how

choices.label: his uncle almost survived the eruption
the eruption destroyed the writings of his uncle
people may not remember the eruption in the future
his uncle’s death in the eruption will make his uncle famous

content.answer: his uncle’s death in the eruption will make his uncle famous

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
